text: The Jeju Islamic Cultural Center or Jeju Islamic Center (JICC; ) is an Islamic cultural center in Nohyeong, Jeju City, Jeju Province, South Korea. ==History== The center was founded in 1994 by Kim Dae-yong. ==Activities== The center provides prayer room for Muslim visitors and also Muslim-related tourism services for them when visiting the island. ==See also== * Islam in South Korea ==References== Category:1994 establishments in South Korea Category:Buildings and structures in Jeju Province Category:Cultural centers Category:Culture in Jeju Province Category:Islam in South Korea Category:Jeju City
title: Jeju Islamic Cultural Center
